# mdaviz_groupmeans { #pybiber.BiberAnalyzer.mdaviz_groupmeans }

```python
BiberAnalyzer.mdaviz_groupmeans(factor=1, width=3, height=7, dpi=150)
```

Generate a stick plot of the group means for a factor.

## Parameters {.doc-section .doc-section-parameters}

| Name   | Type   | Description                      | Default   |
|--------|--------|----------------------------------|-----------|
| factor |        | The factor or dimension to plot. | `1`       |
| width  |        | The width of the plot.           | `3`       |
| height |        | The height of the plot.          | `7`       |
| dpi    |        | The resolution of the plot.      | `150`     |

## Returns {.doc-section .doc-section-returns}

| Name   | Type   | Description          |
|--------|--------|----------------------|
|        | Figure | A matplotlib figure. |
